transcript: I think there's some things that people up with sales training the goal of the sales training is to gain adherence to the script that is the primary objective of sales training is to gain strict script adherence I've listened to last six calls they all sound different I just need to say these words and the thing is is that if they follow the script they will also make more money and you will make more money and if you want to change something once you have complete script adherence you can change it across the team immediately because you train the one skill that mattered which was script adherence if you've got a bunch of Renegades no wonder you can't fix your sales because everybody does a different thing every time
